name: Block Jump Forever Christmas
description:
This is a game that can compete with “Flappy Bird”. It seems to be easy but hard, which all depend on your brain. This is your only option for toilet time and tea time. Lol!

Game-play:
* Run as fast as you can, because the road after you is collapsing.
* Tap to walk.
* Swipe to jump the stairs.
* There will be all types of free power-ups, you need to jump to get them.
* When your score is high enough, you can experience a bonus level in which you tap left and right to get as many as timing power-ups as possible. The timing power-up can prevent you from any harm during this time, so that you can get higher score easily.

Features:
* 3D scene and character.
* 10 free themes randomly switched.
* 50 characters to collect and choose. Each character has its own unique skill.
* Diverse game-play.

Challenging worldwide players to get the highest score!
